Hello Bharath,

I've been investigating this behavior and without a HAR file I'm not finding any cause for the behavior to occur for the user. 

Their user in Care seems to have all the permissions that they'd need to access this, with the Community side having "Access reports in Community Analytics" set to Allow, and "Provide admin access to Community Analytics" permission set to Allow Grant in the screenshot you provided. 

As you've said that we cannot get HAR file due to security concerns, would it be possible to ask the user to check their browser console and see if any errors appear there when they click to view Community Analytics? 

If a screenshot is not possible, if they could just check and let us know if they see any particular error that would help move this forward. 

Thank you for your time,

Khoros Case Portal Access:
 -  If you do not have access to the Khoros Case Portal then reach out to Maia, Khoros’s virtual assistant, on the Atlas homepage (https://community.khoros.com) and type “Add Case Portal access”. This is an easy and quick way to request access.
 - Alternatively, you can request access by contacting Khoros Support at support@khoros.com.
 - Please do visit the Khoros Case Portal information page:
https://community.khoros.com/t5/Support-Information/Using-the-Khoros-Community-Case-Portal/ta-p/181211.

Thank you again for reaching out to Khoros Support, we will be in touch soon.
